experiences.detail:
● ShareRing is an Australian company with a focus on blockchain technology.
● Solely responsible for building and maintainig GraphQL and RESTful API servers for mobile apps and web apps using Microservice architecture.
● Configure load balancing using nginx
● Configure ActiveMQ to cache and distribute requests to approriate services.
● Optimize NoSQL server (MongoDB) ● Stack: NodeJS, MongoDB, Amazon AWS Service, NoSQL, Docker

● Build RESTful API server using Django REST framework
● Contribute to design system to handle 500K requests per min and over 10k concurrent requests at peak using microservices with gRPC communication.
● Design and optimize APIs to serve low-resource devices such as smart TV ● Deploy InnoDB cluster of MySQL servers ( 1 master, 3 slaves) to handle access to millions of records
● Stack: Python, InnoDB, Docker, RabbitMQ, RPC server

● Onsite support for 5 months in India, 2 years in China and Taiwan ● Design and develop APIs for Automation System using Python ● Create test plans and test cases
● Write user guide for customers
